subject: Order #SSN5472
description_text:
Hello,


I’m writing to ask about the status of my order (#SSN5472). I placed the
order on December 29, and as of today, January 5, I haven’t seen any
updates yet.


I’d appreciate any information you can share.


Thank you for your help.

<https://account.simsonn.com/orders>

conversations.body_text: Hi Nwonknu,  Due to a few days off during the New Year holiday, emails were accumulated, which caused a delay in our response. We sincerely apologize for this. We are currently working overtime to produce the HS Pro, and we will arrange shipment for you as soon as possible.
Hi Nwonknu,    We apologize for not updating you promptly about your shipment. Your package has been shipped.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224438979
